src:
Tak Khawatir Partai Gelora Akan Deklarasi, PKS: Monggo Saja
07 Nov 2019, 19:09 by Nur Azizah Rizki Astuti
Jakarta - PKS tak mempermasalahkan adanya Partai Gelora yang akan segera dideklarasikan. PKS menegaskan akan tetap berfokus membesarkan partai.
"Gelora monggo saja, ini negara bebas kok. PKS fokus membangun partai untuk menjadi partai yang besar. Aman (tak masalah ada Partai Gelora)," kata Ketua DPP PKS Mardani Ali Sera di kantor Dewan Nasional Pergerakan Indonesia Maju (DN-PIM), Pejaten, Jakarta Selatan, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Mardani mengaku tak khawatir jika nantinya Partai Gelora akan menarik tokoh-tokoh dari PKS untuk bergabung. Diketahui, Partai Gelora diinisiasi oleh mantan elite PKS, seperti Anis Matta hingga Fahri Hamzah.
Mardani juga tak khawatir soal berkurangnya suara konstituen PKS. Menurut Mardani, Partai Gelora tak akan mudah mengambil suara mereka.
"Kan belum ketahuan, nggak mudah ngambil dong. PKS kan rapi. Belum ketahuan pemilu pilkadanya. Kita sih tidak mikirin orang lain, kita mikirin diri sendiri, PKS sendiri," ujar Mardani.

text:
No Worry The Gelora Party Will Declaration, PKS: Just Go
Nov 7 2019, 19:09 by Nur Azizah Rizki Astuti
Jakarta - PKS has no problem with the Gelora Party which will soon be declared. PKS emphasized that it would remain focused on raising the party.
"Just be happy, this is a free country. PKS is focused on building parties to become big parties. Safe (no problem there is a Gelora Party)," said PKS DPP Chairman Mardani Ali Sera at the office of the National Movement for Advanced Indonesia (DN-PIM), Pejaten, South Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Mardani claimed not to worry if the Gelora Party would later withdraw figures from the PKS to join. It is known that the Gelora Party was initiated by former PKS elites, such as Anis Matta to Fahri Hamzah.
Mardani is also not worried about the reduced PKS constituency vote. According to Mardani, the Gelora Party will not easily take their votes.
"It hasn't been discovered yet, it's not easy to take it. The PKS is neat. The election election hasn't been discovered yet. We don't think about other people, we think about ourselves, PKS itself," Mardani said.
